text: Ðis is þara XXX hida boc æt Ellandune þe Eadgi cing bocode ælfæge his mege on ece yrfe.
Ðis synt þa land ge mære to Ellendune.
Ærest of þam æþenan byrgelsæ andlang wegæs to cærscumbæ.
Of mædæna coua on ðone hric weg to ealhæræs byrgelse.
Þonon andlang þære dic, to hafuc þornæ.
Of þam þornæ on ðone bradan stan.
Of þam mære, on hælnes þorn.
Of þam þorne on þone broc.
Of þam stybbæ on ðære ciricean heow wah.
Of hrud wyllæ to hrysan beorge of ðam beorge to cealdan beorge of þam beorge andlang weges to þam stane.
Of þam stane æft to þam æþænan byrgelse.
